amendment.description: Amendment enables two or more companies to meet individual financial responsibility requirements by pooling resources or obtaining joint insurance coverage.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 111-582 to allow a group of companies to cooperate to meet financial responsibility requirements by pooling of resources or joint insurance coverage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 8 (Roll no. 509).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Teague.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 8 (Roll no. 509).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
